EngLawName: Fee-charging Standards for Licensure Exam Application for Nurse Practitioners
name: 專科護理師申請甄審收費標準
histories: All the four articles were established and promulgated as per the Department of Health's Order Wei-Shu-Zhao-Zi No. 0952800889 dated June 29, 2006; the four articles came into effect on the date of promulgation.
The provisions of Article 2 were amended and promulgated as per the Department of Health's Order Wei-Shu-Zhao-Zi No. 0962802216 dated November 13, 2007.

The title and the provisions of Articles 2 and 3 were amended and promulgated as per the Ministry of Health and Welfare's Order Wei-Bu-Zhao-Zi No. 1101560212 dated May 12, 2021 (the previous title: Fee Standard for Applications for Examination of Nurse Practitioners Specializing in Internal Medicine and Surgery; the new title: Fee-charging Standards for Licensure Exam Application for Nurse Practitioners).

articles.content: This Standard is established in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
This Standard shall come into effect on the date of promulgation.
